name: Lunar Miner
description:
This game is based on Project Boost from the udemy Unity Course.

You are the only one with a spaceship on your homeplanet and an important mission of getting inside the moon and getting the super fuel crystal.

Controls:

Space - thrust, a/d or left and right arrow keys - rotating ship left and right

How to Play:

Start on green pad and aim at landing on the last green pad to pass the level.

Some green pads across the level act as checkpoints.

Blue pads act as shield generators, landing on them will give you 1 level of a shield, that protects you from one hit on any obstacle.
